sense.def:
Kdor je
brave
, je voljan početi nevarne stvari in v težavnih ali nevarnih okoliščinah ne pokaže strahu.

seg.quote: ...the brave young men who have fallen in the struggle.
I think you were very brave to defy convention.
He fought bravely at the Battle of Waterloo.

sense.def:
To be putting a brave face on a difficult situation
pomeni, da se tisti človek samo pretvarja, da je kos težavam.

To brave a difficult or dangerous situation
pomeni spopasti se s težavnim ali nevarnim položajem, da bi nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: Farmers braved wintry conditions to rescue the sheep.
